VoiceList.Entry: Tifa “Everyone's gone…”
Cloud “Yeah,we don't have anywhere or anyone to go home to.”
Tifa “You're right…”
Tifa “But…I'm sure someday… they'll come back,don't you think?”
Cloud “Hmm… I wonder…”
Cloud “Everyone has something irreplaceable they're holding on to…”
“But this time,our opponent…”
Tifa “Hmm…But that's all right, if no one comes back.”
“As long as we're together. With you by my side,I'll never give up no matter how bad it gets.”
Cloud “… Tifa…”
Tifa “No matter how close we are now… We were far apart before.”
“But when we were in the Lifestream surrounded by all those screams of anguish, I thought I heard your voice…”
Tifa “…sniff…you probably don't remember this…”
“But deep in my heart I heard you calling my name…4 Or at least I thought I did…”
Cloud “Yeah… I heard you calling me.”
“You were calling me back from the consciousness in the Lifestream.”
Cloud “After all,I promised that if anything ever happened to you,I'd come to help.”
Tifa “Cloud…? Do you think the stars can hear us?”
Tifa “Do you think they see how hard we're fighting for them?”
Cloud “I dunno… But…”
“Whether they can or not,we still have to do what we can. And believe in ourselves…”
Cloud “Someday we'll find the answer.4 Right,Tifa?”
“That's what I learned from you when I was in the Lifestream.”
Tifa “Yes…that's right…”
Cloud “Hey Tifa…I…* There were so many things I wanted to say to you.”
Cloud “But now that we're together like this, I don't know what to say…”
“I guess nothing's changed at all… Funny,isn't it?”
“No… No it isn't…”
Tifa “Cloud… Words aren't the only thing that tell people what you're thinking…”
Cloud “…”
Cloud “I'll find the answer someday.4 As long as I keep trying.”
Cloud “We've got a big battle tomorrow, we'd better get some sleep…”
Tifa “Umm.> I guess you're right…”
Cloud “I see…”
Cloud “I think I've heard it,too.”
“Then, it was Tifa's voice…”
